intents.description: Information about the company's background and history

examples.text: What is the history of your company?
Tell me about the company's founding.
Can you provide an overview of the company's background?
What was the inspiration behind starting the company?

intents.description: General overview of the company, including its purpose, products, or services

examples.text: Give me an overview of your company.
What are your company's main products or services?
What is your company's main focus?
Can you tell me more about your company?

intents.description: Information about the company's mission and the values it adheres to

examples.text: What values does your company follow?
Can you share your company's mission statement?
What does your company stand for?
How does your company align with its values?

intents.description: Details of services provided by the company

examples.text: What can you help me with?
What is your email or phone number?
How do I reach customer support?

intents.description: Information about careers and job opportunities

examples.text: How can I apply for a job?
Where can I submit my resume?
What is the name of your company?
Can you tell me your company name?

intents.description: A brief description of the company

examples.text: Can you give me a brief overview of your company?
Can you show me your portfolio?
What kind of projects have you worked on?
Can you share some examples of your work?
Can you share some testimonials from your clients?
What do your clients say about your company?
Can you provide some feedback from satisfied customers?
Can you tell me more about your services?
What kind of solutions do you provide?
Can you tell me about your project Dine in Jerusalem?
What was your role in the Piccirillo Handicraft Center project?
Can you share more about the Bethlehem Star Olive Wood Factory project?
Can I reach you by phone or email?

dialog_nodes.output_text: Hello! How can I assist you today?
You're welcome! Let me know if you need anything else.
Our company name is Element Media.
Element Media is a leading software company specializing in digital services.
Element Media was founded in January 2018.
At Element Media, we provide top-tier quality and professionalism to our clients.
Our mission is to foster YOUR project—whatever it may be—to ensure that your idea gets the attention it deserves.
We offer Web Development, Mobile Development, SEO Optimization, Web Hosting, Video Production, and Graphic Design services.
You can contact us at Nativity Street, Bethlehem, PS 1178 Broadway, New York, NY 10001 or by phone/email.
We are always looking for talented individuals to join our dynamic team. Check our job openings for more information.
Our portfolio showcases a range of projects that demonstrate our expertise and creativity.
Here are some testimonials from our satisfied clients.
We provide a range of services, including Web Development, Mobile Development, SEO Optimization, Web Hosting, Video Production, and Graphic Design.
Here are some examples of our portfolio projects.
You can contact us at Nativity Street, Bethlehem, PS 1178 Broadway, New York, NY 10001 or by phone/email.
